webPageDetails.title: Web Page Details
webPageDetails.description: Details about the web page where the web interaction occurred.

webInteraction.title: Web Interaction
webInteraction.description: Details about the web link (URL) that corresponds to where the interaction occurred.

webReferrer.title: Web Referrer
webReferrer.description: The referrer of a web interaction, which is the URL a visitor came from immediately before the current web interaction was recorded.
